column18: Audible or silent alarm triggered on entry by those you haven't said can enter
Charm beasts with INT <= 3; spell fails if you hurt beast
HEAL: 1d8 + spellcasting ability modifier. No effect on undead or constructs.
Sense presence of magic. Use action to see auras around creatures/objects.
Sense location and type of disease/ poison/ or poisonous creature.
Restrain target. Large and bigger creatures have advantage to save.
Creates a foggy sphere.  Can be banished by moderate wind.
Create <= 10 berries that HEAL 1 HP each. Expire after 24 hours.
Target hit by ranged attack and those adjacent who fail save hit by thorns.
Mark quarry. Extra 1d6 DAM on weapon hit. Advantage on rolls to find it.
Target's jump distance tripled until spell ends.
Target's speed increases by 10 ft.
Understand and speak to beasts. Get info about nearby locations and monsters.
Beast will relay 25 word message to a target you describe
Target AC is never less than 16 during spell.
Use action to see/hear whatever beast does.  Use action to return.
Ammo fired at creatures within 30 ft. Spell ends when ammo gone.
Grants creature darkvision (60 ft.) but can't see in Darkness aura.
Sense the presence (not location) of any magical or mundane trap nearby.
End one disease or condition (blind/ deaf/ paralyzed/ poisoned) on target.
Name a kind of beast or plant and find the nearest one within 5 miles.
Sense object direction within 1000 ft. or locate it within 30 ft.
Targets get +10 to Stealth checks and can only be tracked by magic.
Target has 1 poison neutralized/ advantage on poison save/ resists poison DAM.
Creatures in area are deafened/ immune to thunder DMG/ can't cast verbally.
Difficult terrain.  Moving into or within area takes 2d4 piercing DAM per 5 ft.
Summon fey spirits as creatures (total CR <= 2) that act as a group.
Damage type is same as ammo/weapon used as component.
Creates bright light. Dispels darkness spells <= 3rd level it overlaps with.
Creatures within 10 ft. of initial target also take 2d8 DAM (DEX save for half).
Hide target from all divination and scrying magic.
Cast short term (creatures move 1/4 speed) or long term (double food yield).
Creature gains resistance to one of: acid/ cold/ fire/ lightning/ or thunder.
Animate plants to communicate with and perform tasks.  See Sourcebook.

column10: short reed or piece of straw
column18: Creatures gain ability to breathe underwater using normal respiration.
Creaturess walk on liquid/ rise 60 ft. per round if under. Still take other damage.
Strong wind keeps gases/ flying creatures/ projectiles/ gaseous creatures away.
Summon fey creatures (CR <= 2) that obey commands.
Immune to difficult terrain/slow/paralyze/restrain. Spend 5ft to escape restrain.
Create vine that lashes out 30 ft. away. Targets failing save pulled 20 ft. to vine.
Sense creature direction within 1000 ft. or locate it within 30 ft.
Target gains resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning/ piercing/ and slashing DMG.
Gain knowledge of the land around you.  See Sourcebook.
Damage type is same as ammo/weapon used as component.
Quiver produces endless ammo.Use bonus action for 2 attacks using ammo.
Enter one tree and emerge from another 500 ft. away. Use once per round.
